rBody.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
Quadam die
tempestate saevissima quassati tempestate gravissima quassati nautae coeperunt sanctum vocare Nicolaum et statim cessavit tempestas

vBody.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

verses.vBody:
Mox illis clamantibus apparuit quidam
dicens eis dicens illis ecce adsum quid vocastis me

rep.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
